short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clumsy Bird that took the app stores by storm and made everyone wonder how can such a simple yet hard to play game be so addictive?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clumsy Bird old style here online and is for free. Click or Tap on the screen, to get started. Fly the bird as far as you can without hitting a pipe and try to wins all medals.
